secure-serve.description: Serves a Next.js app securely by setting a proxy in front of the app.

e2e-with-serve.description: Serves a Next.js app securely by setting a proxy in front of the app and then runs Cypress tests.

storybook.description: Run storybook with NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider to support webpack4 openssl provider

copy-assets-to-app.description: Copies assets from assets library to selected app (based on context)

copy-assets-to-storybook.description: Copies assets from assets library to storybook

copy-translations-to-app.description: Copies translations from translations library to selected app (based on context)

copy-translations-to-storybook.description: Copies translations from translations library to storybook
